Name: Corfu
Description: The largest of the Ionian Islands, known for its Venetian architecture and lush landscapes.

Name: Kefalonia
Description: An island famous for its rugged mountains, beautiful beaches, and the Melissani Cave.

Name: Zakynthos
Description: Known for its stunning beaches, including the famous Navagio Beach, and the endangered caretta-caretta turtles.

Name: Lefkada
Description: A popular island known for its pristine beaches, including Porto Katsiki, and the town of Lefkada.

Name: Ithaca
Description: A small island known for its scenic beauty and its connection to the legendary hero Odysseus.

Name: Paxos
Description: A small, tranquil island known for its picturesque villages and crystal-clear waters.
